detail.description:
Before proceeding with the loan transaction, DO study the TERMS&CONDITIONS in the Disclosure Statement .
Production
Low interest and flexible repayment.
Loan term :91 days - 120 days
The loan amount we here offer is at P2000 - P20,000. As for the actual loan amount, it can be adjust depending on your own need.
Flexible loan term option with interest starting from 1%.
Loan interest: up to 14%/year (APR)
Transaction fee: zero
For example, if you choose a loan limit of P5000 with a period of 1 year,you total must be paid:P5000*14%+P5000=P5700

fast cash provides non-collateral and no guarantee required online loan service to every ordinary borrower, to help every Filipino solve their financial problems.

Why choose fast cash?
No collateral and guarantee required.

Loan application procedure for first time borrowers:
1.Download Snapera application.
2.Register a personal account in the app.
3.Choose your loan amount and loan term.
4.Fill in personal info.
5.Loan review and cash disbursement.

Requirement
1.Philippine nationalities
2.Aged between 18 to 55.
3.Valid ID required: SSS/UMID/TIN/PassPort/Drivers License ID(either type)

SEC company name：Fcash Global Lending INC.
SEC company registration NO.CS201803813
CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY NO.2653
company address：Unit D NO.41 12th street,Mariana,Quezon City,Second District,NCR,Philippines 1112.
For any inquiries, kindly contact our online customer service or reach us at cs@fcash.ph
